summary: The Faithful Patriot Campaign Medal Act directs the Secretary of Defense to design and produce a military service medal, the Faithful Patriot Campaign Medal, to honor members of the Armed Forces and veterans who served on the U.S.-Mexico border during Operation Faithful Patriot or any subsequent operation there. The Secretary will issue this medal to eligible individuals upon request, and to the next-of-kin of deceased eligible individuals. An application process will be established for this purpose.
